init_connection_error.message: Unable to reach the primary node on {primary_ip}, msg: {exc_msg}.

init_mesh_timeout.message: Timeout initialising the mesh (current timeout: {current_timeout}s), consider increasing the API timeout in the configuration.

coordinator_mesh_exception.message: An error was encountered whilst communicating with with the mesh, type: {exc_type}, msg: {exc_msg}

coordinator_mesh_timeout.message: Timeout gathering data from the mesh (current timeout: {current_timeout}s), consider increasing the timeout if this happens a lot.

device_tracker_timeout.message: Timeout whilst gathering device tracker details.

failed_login.message: Failed to login to the mesh.

general.message: A currently uncaught exception was encountered, type: {exc_type}, msg: {exc_msg}.

intensive_task.message: The following intensive tasks are currently running: {tasks}, ignoring errors.

confirm_removal.title: Remove the device tracker
confirm_removal.description: {device_name} is no longer on the Mesh or it's unique ID has changed. Click submit to remove the device tracker from Home Assistant.

confirm_removal.title: Remove the device
confirm_removal.description: The {device_name} UI device is no longer on the Mesh or it's unique ID has changed. Click submit to remove it from Home Assistant.

data.select_temp_ui_device: Use a temporary device for select entity details

data_description.allow_mesh_reboot: Creates a button on the Mesh service that allows rebooting of the whole mesh.
data_description.node_images:
Path to the velop images, e.g. /local/velop_images.
Use * to remove the value.
data_description.select_temp_ui_device: This option will stop writing the selected device details to the attributes and use a temporary device instead.

advanced_options.description:
Options below are considered advanced for various reasons.
Configure them carefully.
